column2: SELECT `ID`,`AccessionDate`,`Title`,`Identifier`,`InclusiveDates`,`Donor`,`DonorContactInformation`,`DonorNotes`,`PhysicalDescription`,`ScopeContent` FROM `tblAccessions_Accessions` WHERE `dateadded` >= NOW() - INTERVAL [%date%] DAY ORDER BY `tblAccessions_Accessions`.`AccessionDate` DESC

SELECT c.ID, C.Title as CollectionName, LV.LevelContainer as ContainerType, LevelContainerIdentifier as ItemNum, c.Title, Date, Description, c.dateadded FROM tblCollections_Content as c LEFT JOIN tblCollections_Collections as C on C.ID=c.CollectionID LEFT JOIN tblCollections_LevelContainers as LV on LV.ID=c.LevelContainerID WHERE c.dateadded >= NOW() - INTERVAL [%date%] DAY ORDER BY C.Title ASC

SELECT `ID`,`CollectionIdentifier`,`Title`,`PredominantDates`,`NormalDateBegin`,`NormalDateEnd`,`Scope`,`dateadded` FROM `tblCollections_Collections` WHERE `dateadded` >= NOW() - INTERVAL [%date%] DAY
SELECT * FROM `tblDigitalLibrary_DigitalContent` WHERE `dateadded` >= NOW() - INTERVAL [%date%] DAY ORDER BY `tblDigitalLibrary_DigitalContent`.`Title` ASC

SELECT f.ID, f.DigitalContentID, f.Title as FileName, dl.title as DigitalLibraryTitle FROM tblDigitalLibrary_Files as f LEFT JOIN tblDigitalLibrary_DigitalContent as dl on dl.ID=f.DigitalContentID WHERE dl.dateadded >= NOW() - INTERVAL [%date%] DAY
